Articles.Content: Hi, I\'m new to the foruns, and I have used KSP since v0.13.2, and I think that 0.15.0 is just amazing! My only question about 0.15 is; 'How do you stop the spaceplane controls from being so touchy?' I pull the tiniest bit on my joystick, and my spaceplane shoots up and flips over and I have to pull the emergency parachute. How do I make these so controllable ????
Hi, welcome to the forums. I tend to build bigger planes, as they turn slower. That can help.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Yay! Another Jeb! It\'s amazing, I never knew so many people were named Jeb!
